results.content: 请您将手扣的管线接到血压检测器

phrase.content: 1) Connect the blood pressure cuff to the reader machine.

results.romanized: Qǐng nín jiàng shǒu kòu de guǎn xiàn jiē dào xiě yā jiǎn cè qì

results.content: 手扣上的箭头应该指向您手臂的内侧

phrase.content: 2) The “arrow” on the the cuff should be pointing downwards on the inside of your arm.

results.romanized: Shǒu kòu shàng de jiàn tóu yīng gāi zhǐ xiàng nín shǒu bì de nèi cè

results.content: 手扣位置应该位于您手肘的1-2公分以上

phrase.content: (!) The cuff should be positioned 1 to 2 cm above your elbow joint.

results.romanized: Shǒu kòu wèi zhì yīng gāi wèi yú nín shǒu zhǒu de yī dào èr gōng fēn yǐ shàng

results.content: 手扣不应该系得太紧，也不应该太松。 留大概一根手指的空间就好了

phrase.content: 3) The BP cuff should fit snugly onto your arm. It should not feel loose. Leave some space enough for 1 left finger to fit in (for good gauge)

results.romanized: Shǒu kòu bù yìng gāi xì dé tài jǐn, yě bù yìng gāi tài sōng. Liú dà gài yī gēn shǒu zhǐ de kōng jiān jiù hǎo le

results.content: 测量血压时，请避免按压血压器的管线

phrase.content: 4) Do not bend the tube during blood pressure measurement.

results.romanized: cèl liáng xiě yā shí, qǐng bì miǎn àn yā xiě yā qì de guǎn xiàn

results.content: 测量血压时，请放轻松，将整个手臂放在桌上

phrase.content: 5) Relax & Rest your entire arm on a table while measuring your blood pressure.

results.romanized: cè liáng xiě yā shí, qǐng fàng qīng sōng, jiāng zhěng gè shǒubì fàng zài zhuō shàng

results.content: 按 “开始／停止” 的青/蓝/黑色按钮以开始测量血压。请等上一分钟，直到屏幕显示三组号码

phrase.content: 6) Press the “Start/Stop” button to start measuring your BP. Wait for 1 minute until 3 numbers appear.

results.romanized: Àn “kāi shǐ / tíng zhǐ” de qīng / lán / hēi sè àn niǔ yǐ kāi shǐ cè liáng xiě yā. Qǐng děng shàng yī fēn zhōng, zhí dào píng mù xiǎn shì sān zǔ hào mǎ

results.content: 第一个号数是您的收缩压。第二个号数是您的舒张压。最后的号数是您的心跳率。

phrase.content: 7) The top number is your Systolic blood pressure. The middle number is your Diastolic blood pressure. The bottom number is your Pulse rate.

results.romanized: Dì yī gè hào shù shì nín de shōu suō yā. Dì èr gè hào shù shì nín de shū zhāng yā. Zuì hòu de hào shù shì nín de xīn tiào lǜ.
